name: efe-workflow
description: 前端组活动开发工作流

scripts.dev:two: npm run clean && npm run d:t-p | npm run d:t-m
scripts.dev:pc: npm run clean && npm run d:t-p
scripts.dev:mb: npm run clean && npm run d:t-m
scripts.build:two: npm run clean && npm run b:p && npm run b:m
scripts.build:two-cdn: npm run clean && npm run b:p-cdn && npm run b:m-cdn
scripts.ftp:two-online: npm run ftp:pc-online && npm run ftp:mb-online
scripts.ftp:two-pre: npm run ftp:pc-pre && npm run ftp:mb-pre
scripts.ftp:two-all: npm run ftp:two-online && npm run ftp:two-pre
scripts.deploy:two-all: npm run build:two && npm run ftp:two-all
scripts.deploy:two-pre: npm run build:two && npm run ftp:two-pre
scripts.deploy:two-online: npm run build:two && npm run ftp:two-online
scripts.deploy:pc-pre: npm run build:pc && npm run ftp:pc-pre
scripts.deploy:pc-online: npm run build:pc && npm run ftp:pc-online
scripts.deploy:mb-pre: npm run build:mb && npm run ftp:mb-pre
scripts.deploy:mb-online: npm run build:mb && npm run ftp:mb-online
scripts.deploy:two-cdn-all: npm run build:two-cdn && npm run ftp:two-all
scripts.deploy:two-cdn-pre: npm run build:two-cdn && npm run ftp:two-pre
scripts.deploy:two-cdn-online: npm run build:two-cdn && npm run ftp:two-online
scripts.deploy:pc-cdn-pre: npm run build:pc-cdn && npm run ftp:pc-pre
scripts.deploy:pc-cdn-online: npm run build:pc-cdn && npm run ftp:pc-online
scripts.deploy:mb-cdn-pre: npm run build:mb-cdn && npm run ftp:mb-pre
scripts.deploy:mb-cdn-online: npm run build:mb-cdn && npm run ftp:mb-online
scripts.b:p: parcel build src/pc/*.html --no-cache --no-minify --no-content-hash -d dist/pc --public-url ./ && npm run copy:pc-public
scripts.b:m: parcel build src/mb/*.html --no-cache --no-minify --no-content-hash -d dist/mobile --public-url ./ && npm run copy:mb-public
scripts.b:p-cdn: parcel build src/pc/*.html --no-cache -d dist/pc --public-url CDN前缀/pc && npm run copy:pc-public
scripts.b:m-cdn: parcel build src/mb/*.html --no-cache -d dist/mobile --public-url CDN前缀/mobile && npm run copy:mb-public

author: DodoMonster
